_meanings:
{@--4@} To stand (still), make a halt,
stop; <ls>Bg. 1. 30</ls>, <ls n="Bg.">14. 23</ls>; <ls>R. 2. 31</ls>,
<ls>Ku. 3. 42</ls>, <ls>Śi. 9. 83.</ls>

{@--5@} To stand,
exist, chance to be.

{@--8@} To stand apart, go off,
withdraw.

{@--4@} To 
compose, collect, steady, fix (as heart
&c.); {#na Saknomi hfdayamavasTApayituM#} <ls>U. 4.</ls>
